mapper.select: SELECT osc.`id`, osc.`transport_no` transportNo, osc.`vehicle_size` vehicleSize, osc.`vehicle_type` vehicleType, osc.`cntr_no` cntrNo, vi.supplier_id supplierId, si.`supplier_ch_name` supplierName, vi.id vehicleId, vi.`plate_number` plateNumber, di.`name` driverName, osc.driver_info_id driverInfoId, vi.hk_number hkNumber, di.phone driverPhone, osc.`describes`, osc.`status`, osc.`order_no` orderNo, osc.`remarks`, osc.`jockey_id`, wi.id warehouseInfoId, wi.`warehouse_name` warehouseName, wi.`contacts` warehouseContacts, wi.`contact_number` warehouseNumber, wi.is_virtual isVirtual, '中国' countryName, ( SELECT rc.NAME FROM region_city rc WHERE rc.id = wi.state_code LIMIT 1 ) AS provinceName, ( SELECT rc.NAME FROM region_city rc WHERE rc.id = wi.city_code LIMIT 1 ) AS cityName, wi.`address` address FROM order_transport ot LEFT JOIN warehouse_info wi ON wi.`id` = ot.`warehouse_info_id` left join order_send_cars osc on ot.order_no = osc.order_no LEFT JOIN driver_info di ON di.id = osc.driver_info_id LEFT JOIN vehicle_info vi ON vi.id = osc.vehicle_id LEFT JOIN supplier_info si ON vi.`supplier_id` = si.`id` WHERE ot.`order_no` = #{orderNo}

SELECT ot.legal_name legalName,le.rigis_address rigisAddress,le.phone legalPhone,le.fax, di.`name`,di.id_no idNo,di.hk_phone hkPhone,di.phone, vi.pt_company ptCompany,vi.customs_code customsCode,vi.plate_number plateNumber,vi.hk_number hkNumber,'' qs, vi.vehicle_tonnage vehicleTonnage,vi.pt_phone ptPhone,vi.pt_fax ptFax,vi.stepping_code steppingCode,'' loadList, vi.enterprise_code enterpriseCode,vi.weight, osc.jockey_id jockeyId,osc.jockey, (select name from port_info pi where pi.id_code = ot.port_code) portCodeDesc FROM order_transport ot LEFT JOIN legal_entity le on le.legal_name = ot.legal_name left join order_send_cars osc on ot.order_no = osc.order_no LEFT JOIN driver_info di ON di.id = osc.driver_info_id LEFT JOIN vehicle_info vi ON vi.id = osc.vehicle_id WHERE ot.`order_no` = #{orderNo}

SELECT ot.legal_name legalName, le.legal_en_name legalEnName, ot.order_no jobNumber, di.phone, vi.plate_number plateNumber, ota1.enter_warehouse_no enterWarehouseNo, (select DATE_FORMAT(ota.take_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) from order_take_adr ota where ota.opr_type = '1' and ota.order_no = ot.order_no limit 1) createTimeStr, di.`name`, ota1.take_time takeTimeStr, CONCAT(ifnull(da.state_name,''),ifnull(da.city_name,''),da.address) address, ota1.piece_amount pieceAmount, ota1.weight, ota1.remarks FROM order_transport ot left join legal_entity le on le.legal_name = ot.legal_name left join order_take_adr ota1 on ota1.order_no = ot.order_no and ota1.opr_type = '2' left join delivery_address da on da.id = ota1.delivery_id left join order_send_cars osc on osc.order_no = ot.order_no left join driver_info di on di.id = osc.driver_info_id left join vehicle_info vi on vi.id = osc.vehicle_id WHERE ot.order_no = #{orderNo}
